name: Single Kettlebell Athletic Workout
description: Build an athletic physique at home with just one kettlebell. Five alternating exercises — swings, cleans, goblet squats, presses, and offset pushups — all x12. @Asgooch says you don't need a gym.

exercises.name: Alternating Kettlebell Clean
exercises.description: Clean to rack, alternating arms each rep.
exercises.notes: 6 per side. Leg drive, elbow close.

exercises.name: Alternating Goblet Squat
exercises.description: Goblet squat holding KB with one hand at chest, alternating.

exercises.name: Alternating Kettlebell Press
exercises.notes: 6 per side. Core tight, straight up.

exercises.name: Offset Push-up
exercises.description: One hand on the KB handle, one on the ground. Push up.

circuit.notes: Back-to-back as a circuit. Alternating exercises add core stability challenge.

raw.caption: Building an athletic physique at home with just one kettlebell. Yep, that's right. You don't need a full gym, you don't even need to go to a gym. One kettlebell is enough to build a solid athletic physique. Link in bio for Programs.
raw.visualSummary: Muscular man demonstrates exercises outdoors on a mat.
